author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Added additional test files for ODT export, copied from XHTML test cases, for
more extensive testing of conversion capabilities.
# Some of these tests still fail, hang on...
- Added handling of special paragraphs and inline literal.

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Added validation for ODT documents through ODT 1.2 draft Relax NG.
# This is what recent OpenOffice.org uses.
- Fixed smaller validation issues in generated ODFs.

author: fmenge:ez.no
msg: - Improved constructor of ezcReflectionMethod and methods getMethod() and
getMethods() of ezcReflectionClass in order to fix some tests in PHP 5.3.0
